options.name: Isolationist
options.description: The Orycotal culture is one of both suspicion and superstition. Gain +1 Initiative and +1 Insight

options.name: Encouraged Curiousity
options.description: The Orycotal are taught that the most curious are often the most rewarded. You gain +1 Search and become Good at either the Search or Initiative Skill

options.name: Craft : Improved Accessory
options.description: The Orycotal appreciate the beauty and power of accessories like rings. When you Craft an Accessory, it has an extra Infusion Slot.

options.name: Reaction : Trained against Darkness
options.description: In response to taking Dark Damage, reduce the amount by double your Level. If all the Dark Damage was Mitigated, gain Temporary Health equal to your Level until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Emnity of the Fey
options.description: Certain factions within the Orycotal culture have an extreme distrust of the Fey and prepare to face them at every turn. Gain +1 Resistance and +2 Psychic Mitigation.

options.name: Ally of the Fey
options.description: Certain factions within  the Orycotal culture have allied themselves with the Fey. You Learn 3 Beginner and 3 Novice Fey Magic Spells.

options.name: Culture of Tranquility
options.description: The Orycotal are taught not to act in anger. Through learning and practice, you have become Immune to the Maddened Condition.
